product_name: LancomeUV Expert Defense SPF 50+ Primer & Moisturizer
summary: SummaryLancÃ´me UV Expert Defense SPF 50+ Primer & Moisturizer is a three-in-one product that offers invisible SPF 50 sun protection, hydrates the skin, and primes the face for makeup application in one easy step.
details: DetailsFeaturesMade with antioxidant-rich Vitamin E, Moringa seed extract, and Edelweiss, this lightweight moisturizer with SPF 50 works as a face sunscreen and makeup primer to hydrate, prime, and help protect the skin in one easy step.Hydrates and soothes the skin, leaving it with a healthy-looking glow.Uses broad spectrum SPF 50 sunscreen protection and offers a comfortable, fast-absorbing texture. It helps protect skin as the # 1 selling prestige SPF 50 in-sun face product.**Sun Protection: Provides SPF 50 protection that helps prevent sunburn and decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun.*Lightweight Texture Experience: The cooling Aquagel texture transforms into a water-like gel that is highly breathable and absorbs quickly into the skin with no white cast or greasy residue.Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.*If used as directed with other sun protection measures.**Source: TheÂ NPDÂ Group/U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Measured Market, Skincare Unit Sales, Annual 2021.Key IngredientsVitamin E: Known for its antioxidant properties that can help protect skin from the sunMoringa Extract: Known for its powerful antioxidant propertiesEdelweiss: Known to enhance skin's resistance to external aggressors*Product benefits are based on product formula testing, not on the individual ingredientsParaben-free, mineral oil-freeBenefitsInstantly*:93% say skin feels more hydrated90% agree skin feels softer82% say that product does not leave a white appearance on the skinAfter four weeks*:93% agree skin feels smoother86% say skin tone looks more even85% agree skin appears more radiant, with a healthy-looking glow*Based on self-assessment results in a 4-week consumer study with 88 womenItem 2541521How To UseUse daily after cleansing as an all-in-one face sunscreen, moisturizer, and makeup primer.For a no-makeup look or a day in the sun, apply evenly across all facial zones.If wearing makeup, use as a makeup primer before applying foundation.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3%, Homosalate 15%, Octisalate 5%, Octocrylene 7%. Inactive: Water, Alcohol Denat, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Dimethicone, Acrylates/Dimethicone Copolymer, Tocopherol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Sodium Polyacrylate, Sodium Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium Benzoate, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-8 Laurate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Menthyl Lactate, Pentylene Glycol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Extract, Xanthan Gum, Propanediol, Leontopodium Alpinum Flower/Leaf Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Rosa Meichibon/Delgramaue Callus, Disodium Phosphate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Glycerin, Fragrance, (F.I.L. C262576/1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use daily after cleansing as an all-in-one face sunscreen, moisturizer, and makeup primer.For a no-makeup look or a day in the sun, apply evenly across all facial zones.If wearing makeup, use as a makeup primer before applying foundation.

reviews.headline: Striped Like a Zebra
reviews.comments: I bought this when it was on sale (thankfully) after reading all of the amazing reviews. I'm glad that it works well on so many others, but unfortunately, my experience with this primer has been nothing short of frustrating. For reference, I'm 4W1 in Estee Lauder's Double Wear foundation. I've worn this alone as a sunscreen, which results in it forming white streaks on my neck and around my nose and lips, which looks quite disgusting. When worn under makeup, it starts to pill, resulting in me wasting the last half hour of my life prepping my skin for foundation since I have to take it off and start all over again. I'd suggest that people try it on in the store and see how it wears or wait for it to be on sale like I did (even then, it's not worth it, in my opinion).

reviews.headline: She feels nice
reviews.comments: I love it every time I put it on. It feels silky and luxurious, absorbs quickly and leaves a glowy finish. It's a primer with sunscreen so has a very small whitecast but not visible under makeup.

reviews.headline: Disappointing !! Pills ðŸ˜’
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this product, but unfortunately, it was a major letdown. For the price, you don't get enough product, and the formula is just not itâ€”especially for brown skin. It left a noticeable white cast and made me look gray and oily throughout the day. Even when I skip makeup, it still PILLS!!!, which is incredibly frustrating. I really wanted to like this, but it's just not working for me. Is it just me, or is this a common issue? Either way, I can't recommend it.

reviews.headline: invisible on black skin yes but breaks you out
reviews.comments: This is invisible but it's oily and breaks out your skin.

reviews.headline: Decent but can't get past the scent
reviews.comments: I know fragrance is not good for us but I tend to like scents. This one is just too much and too long. If Lancome had a frangrance-free option I would prefer it but returning because I can't get past the smell. Bought it during half off sale. I definitely wouldn't pay full price.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: It's smooth lite smell one of my favorites

reviews.headline: Not for brown or oily girlies
reviews.comments: I was so excited to try this product but unfortunately it didn't work out for me. For reference I was in shade 420 N in their foundation. This product does indeed leave a white cast and makes me look grey. This product leaves me feeling very greasy and if you add even the slightest too much of the product it moves and disrupts foundation put on top of it. I don't ever mind the price of a product so long as it works and sunscreen is so important is good to invest on a product that's literally protecting you but this isn't it.

reviews.headline: Awesome cream
reviews.comments: Bought this when on sales. Its the best combo sunscreen with vitamin, primer and sunscreen all in one.  Love it!

reviews.headline: Way Too Fragranced
reviews.comments:
This has way too much fragrance and smells like old lady perfume. Shame on me for not reading the ingredients, but not many of the recent reviews mention a strong perfume scent. But if you look at them, it has added fragrance.

The sunscreen itself is ok, but I wouldn't call it lightweight. It's definitely a thicker moisturizer/sunscreen and probably best suited for dry skin. My combo skin wasn't overly greasy, but for me it is just too heavy for daytime use. Also, It didn't do anything to help my makeup look better or last, so not that great as a primer.

I got it during the 21 days of beauty, and even at half price, it's way too much for this product. Other than vitamin E, there are no real skincare benefits in it. There are so many better sunscreens. I hate waste so I'll probably continue to use it as a body sunscreen. But with all the fragrance it's not going anywhere near my face.

reviews.headline: Love the idea but it STINKS
reviews.comments: Causes migraines for me

reviews.headline: Best product I've tried!
reviews.comments: This was recommended to me by a store associate, I was looking for a SPF with moisturizer, so I purchased it and I absolutely love it. It leaves my skin feeling silky and my foundation application goes on smoothly.  I've gotten great compliments indicating my makeup looks great when wearing this underneath.  First time user and will keep this as my staple.

reviews.headline: Dear God no
reviews.comments: Every once in awhile a sunscreen will slightly burn my eyes. When I used this product for the first time, the burning of a thousand suns hit me and I had to remove my contacts and wash my face (not ideal when trying to get to work). My eyes burned most of the day and were sensitive to light. It took an hour before I could drive to work and even then they were still tearing up badly.

reviews.headline: Good on its own, not with makeup
reviews.comments: This product is good when worn on its own (maybe with a light layer of powder) and gives a nice glow to the skin. I tried to wear it under makeup with different primers, liquid products and powder products, and it didn't fair too well;  Always seemed to pill whether I used my fingers to blend, brushes, and even beauty blenders. I used it under water based and also oil based makeup and it seemed to break apart my makeup soon after for both. However as a sunscreen/SPF I can say it didn't sting my sensitive skin too much.

reviews.headline: The scent is horrible
reviews.comments: I can handle some fragrance. But this lasted forever i smelt it for hours after applying. The product itself is fine.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I love that is doesnt leave white cast as others, give me a glowy skin that looks like a new skin, is lightweight, leave super soft feeling, i'll look more specials in this product because definitely I will keep it as my daily. I hadn't  dull skin i was just making cheapest decisions.

reviews.headline: Incredible product
reviews.comments:
I have used this product for years, now. I hate SPF and this one is perfect because it's also a primer.  My makeup lasts longer when I have this one.  

It has gone up in price. I have bought other brands of spf for my face but end up coming back to this one.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: All in one and it works!

reviews.headline: ðŸ’™
reviews.comments:
Moisturizing non greasy sunscreen product.
A little goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Great Product, But Expensive
reviews.comments: I have oily skin and finding an everyday face sunscreen has been a nightmare. This is the best product I have found so far. Goes on easy, absorbs and doesn't leave a sunscreen residue. Leaves my face feeling soft and make up goes on easy after. Bonus for smelling good!!! Not a lot of product for the prices is the only downside.

media.caption: Color 4 without any powder, blush, highlight, or contour

faceoff_positive.comments: I use a primer and moisturizer with SPF daily, and the UV Expert Aqua Gel Defense is the best one I've ever tried.  Application is easy and long-lasting, without streaking, caking, etc.  I highly recommend it for regular skin care.
faceoff_positive.headline: I haven't found a better primer/moisturizer.Great!

faceoff_negative.comments: It starts to peel and flake within a few hrs and I don't have dry skin. I have combo to oily and it peels between my eyebrows, my nose and below my bottom lip. It's not compatible with Lancome concealer, foundation. It peels up even bigger. I asked the salesperson for Bienfait Multi-vital and didn't notice she sold me two bottles of this liquid chalk. All of my products are Lancome and I'm a loyal customer but I've NEVER had this happen even with OTC more affordable sunscreens.
faceoff_negative.headline: Liquid Chalk

rollup.name: UV Expert Defense SPF 50+ Primer & Moisturizer
